channel.title: Runserver.bat help or anyother place...and something other
channel.description:
1.hey i was wondering if there is a way to either make so when my runserver crashes if there is something i can put in it to make so it just closes the window if it stops working?
2.next is i wanted to know if there is a place that lets you set max players on the server...if so where?

item.title: Runserver.bat help or anyother place...and something other
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Newb 2341:

Yes, Brendan, but it doesn’t matter, as the server WILL shut down if the RAM isn’t high enough.

No it won’t. A message is sen’t to the server everytime a player tries to login, the server deny’s the person trying to login, causing spam and most likely a crash, it’s what the guy wants though. Here dude, search this in PlayerHandler.Java

	public static final int maxPlayers =

Change the number after the = to set the max amount.

Read full topic
item.source: Runserver.bat help or anyother place...and something other

item.title: Runserver.bat help or anyother place...and something other
item.dc:creator: @Wreckaz Wreckaz
item.description:
@Wreckaz wrote:

if u mean limit how many ppl on ur server then…
go into playerhandler.java and search for

public static final int maxPlayers =

after the = put max number of players u want on ur server i think thats it ne way…

Read full topic
